thumb.title: Ceremonial (original song, Vocaloid, Brian & Sandra)
thumb.description: It's a melancholic synth-pop song. There are a few songwriting gurus that I follow (YouTube or Instagram), whose wisdom is that the lyrics should convey a story, with development that leads the listener in, provides a connection. Sorry about this: mine tend to be deliberately vague and I like them that way. The listener has to use their imagination to ascertain what it's about. Or not. tbh their advice is sound and probably correct. You can lead a horse to water but you can't make him write better lyrics. Tech Notes Usual synth sounds and FX (see videos passim) plus a shout out to Arturia REV PLATE-140, UAD Pure Plate Reverb, UAD 1176 Compressor, Steinberg AutoFilter -- who all get an airing. Vocal synths from Brian & Sandra, Vocaloid.
